name: FNAB 4
description:
FNAB 4 is finally here! FNAB is a fnaf fan game, All rights to FNAF goes to Scott Cawthon.  Remember to look at the bed each hour in the game.

Best played in fullscreen mode.

Controls:

Click for flashlight. Point and click on the door you want to go to. Flick your mouse backwards to look at bed.
